answers.answer: I had it at the very end of my pregnancy with my daughter. She was overdue five days. I went into the hospital for fetal monitoring, and found out my blood pressure was dangerously high. They induced me that day, because it wasn't safe for my daughter. After 16hours she was born healthy. She's now four and fine. I have not had any long term problems from developing preeclampsia with that pregnancy, and so far so good with this one. I'm 28weeks now.
Ok thank you for sharing I just need to monitor it to be safe. And thats awesome!  Congrats !!
I had chronic hypertension before I got pregnant and was put on meds... as time progressed I was taken off of it... my aunt, grandma, and mom all experienced it..
Thanks congrats to you also! Yes just keep monitoring it, and also pay attention to the symptoms of it being too high. You should be fine

i had preeclamsia with my daughter i made it to my due date.. mine was pretty serious i hemoraged because of it . all i can say mamma is to make sure you do not eat alot of salty foods n good luck... im 32 weeks almost and doing fine hope everything goes well for you

I srarted showing signs of it towards the end. My bp was really high and didn't show any signs of it coming down also extremely bad headaches so I was induced on my due date. Once in labour it was dangerously high so they put me on meds. I can out of hospital with them and just had to take myself off them gradually. As soon as I became pregnant again my bp was up and down but my daughter came early however I was under observation from the word go and I am with this pregnancy and they have prescribed me a low dose of aspirin.They are watching you so thats the main thing. Just watched out for headaches, blurred vision and dizzy spells. Also pain at the top of your bump can be a sign. X

question: So this is my first time having high blood pressure I'm almost 19 weeks. Im on meds but was just wondering if anyone had preeclampsia and what was your experience? I understand every pregnancy is different but just wanted to have an idea....thx ladies
title: Preeclampsia mommies experiences ? ?
